black_pod_disease_mild.recommendation: Remove infected pods and improve field sanitation. Ensure proper drainage to reduce moisture.

black_pod_disease_moderate.recommendation: Remove and destroy infected pods. Apply recommended fungicide and monitor nearby trees regularly.

black_pod_disease_severe.recommendation: Immediately remove all infected pods and apply approved fungicide. Isolate affected trees to prevent spread.

cacao_pod_borer_mild.recommendation: Practice field sanitation and monitor pods weekly. Remove infested pods early.

cacao_pod_borer_moderate.recommendation: Remove infested pods and use pheromone traps. Consider bagging healthy pods.

cacao_pod_borer_severe.recommendation: Apply integrated pest management strategies and destroy heavily infested pods.

healthy.recommendation: The cacao pod is healthy. Continue regular monitoring and good farm management practices.

mealybug_mild.recommendation: Prune affected areas and control ants. Monitor the plant regularly.

mealybug_moderate.recommendation: Apply biological control agents or insecticidal soap.

mealybug_severe.recommendation: Use approved insecticides and isolate affected plants.
